snippet.title: Mythical Whalers Teaser
snippet.description:
Ahoy, fellow adventurers! We’ve just dropped the official teaser trailer for Mythical Whalers, our upcoming nautical fantasy roguelike.

If you’re into seafaring quests, monster hunts, and forging alliances (or rivalries) with unique factions, you’ll want to set sail with us. Each run is procedurally generated—no two voyages are ever the same. Recruit a crew from legendary races, tackle fearsome sea beasts, and make choices that echo throughout your journey.

We’ve poured our hearts into crafting an ever-shifting world full of wonder and danger. If you like what you see in the trailer, please consider wishlisting Mythical Whalers on Steam—it truly helps us get discovered and means the world to our small dev team.

Check it out here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2787860/Mythical_Whalers/

Thank you for your support, and happy sailing! Don’t forget to let us know what you think—we’re excited to hear your feedback. Safe travels on the high seas!
